help.title: Help & User Guide
help.intro: Here you'll find useful information on how to use the goal management app.

add_goal.title: Adding a New Goal
add_goal.content: Click 'Add New Goal', fill in the title, description, category, and select the days you want to perform it. You can select 'Daily' or specific weekdays.

complete_goal.title: Goal achievement
complete_goal.content: On the main screen, click '‚úîÔ∏è Mark as Done' to mark a goal as completed for today. This updates the streak and statistics.

end_day.title: Ending the Day
end_day.content: At the end of each day, click the 'End Day' button. The app will move the date forward and update the streaks and stats for your goals.

stats.title: Statistics
stats.content: Go to the 'Statistics' tab to see your progress using Heatmap, Bar Chart, or Line Chart. Choose a goal and a date range to explore your performance.

archive.title: Archiving Goals
archive.content: You can archive completed goals and restore them later. Use the archive button next to each goal.

settings.title: Settings
settings.content: In settings, you can export/import your data, reset goals, change language and switch to dark mode.
